data.title: Department of Ophthalmology
data.text:
Dr. Michael Chang, MD will be part of the Comprehensive Service. Prior to coming to the Vision Institute, Dr. Chang received his MD from the University of Cincinnati College of Medicine in 2018. He then completed a research internship at Will Eye Hospital (Oncular Oncology) in 2019; followed by an intern year at West Virginia University. Most recently, Dr. Chang completed an ophthalmology residency at West Virginia as well. Dr. Chang is a member of the American Academy of Ophthalmology and the West Virginia Academy of Eye Physicians and Surgeons.

Dr. Chang will be seeing patients at the Vision Institute, Shadyside and the Eye and Ear Institute in Oakland.
